item.title: Only 1 Indian actor made it to The Independent's list of Best Actors of 21st century. It's not Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The Independent listed 60 best actors of the 21st century. Not Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan or Amitabh Bachchan, but this Indian actor made the cut.

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: The Independent

The Independent has curated a list of the 60 best actors of the 21st century. Notably, the list includes international talents while specifically excluding performances from films released after 2000.

  • Irrfan Khan is the only Indian actor to be featured on the list, ranked at #41.
  • Other prominent Indian actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, and Amitabh Bachchan are absent from this list.
  • The late actor celebrated for his roles in films such as The Warrior, Haasil, and Life of Pi.
  • Philip Seymour Hoffman was recognized as the best actor, with female representation by Emma Stone, ranked at #2.
“It’s Irrfan Khan’s eyes, hooded and deep brown, that will live eternally. They granted him the ability to weave magic, to recite poetry without moving his lips.”

The recognition of Irrfan Khan amidst international talents highlights his impactful performances and legacy in cinema.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sanjay Leela Bhansali signs KD director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in progress - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali Signs Director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in Progress

Date & Source: Dec 30, 2024 | 02:59 PM IST | Pinkvilla

Over the years, there has been constant chatter on the sequel to Akshay Kumar’s 2012 blockbuster, Rowdy Rathore, which was produced by Sanjay Leela Bhansali and directed by Prabhudeva. Several names have been floating around in the media to carry forward this cop-based action entertainer. Now, we have exclusively learned that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has signed Kannada film director Prem and has entrusted him with the responsibility of developing the script for Rowdy Rathore 2.

According to sources close to the development, Sanjay Leela Bhansali is very excited to bankroll the sequel to Rowdy Rathore and had locked the core plot of the film a while back. The basic idea of Rowdy Rathore 2 has been in place for the longest time, and SLB was looking to partner with the right forces to develop a banger of a sequel to this 2012 blockbuster. His thoughts have aligned with Prem, and the duo is working towards developing the script of Rowdy Rathore 2.

The source further added that the Rowdy Rathore sequel will move into the casting stage once the screenplay is locked. Prem will full-fledgedly move into the pre-production of Rowdy Rathore 2 after the release of KD – The Devil. The film is expected to take off sometime by the end of 2025, and the casting will begin from Summer next year. Right now, the energies are being invested to develop a script that does justice to the legacy of the first part.

Will Akshay Kumar return to Rowdy Rathore 2? "We shall know that at the right time. It could be Akshay Kumar, a new hero, or who knows, a two-hero film too," the source concluded.

item.title: Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar - 123telugu
item.description:
Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar

Published on Dec 30, 2024 2:33 pm IST

Megastar Chiranjeevi's collaboration with Dasara director Srikanth Odela is finally happening, much to the delight of fans. This long-awaited project promises to set a fresh tone for the iconic star.

  • Chiranjeevi teams up with new-age filmmaker Srikanth Odela.
  • The film will be set against a period backdrop.
  • Odela expresses his disbelief at working with Chiranjeevi, citing a lifelong admiration.
  • He emphasizes that viewers will not see the traditional vintage Megastar.
  • The script was finalized in just 48 hours with Chiranjeevi's enthusiasm inspiring Odela.
  • Odela's upcoming film follows 'The Paradise' with actor Nani.
“You won’t see the vintage Megastar. Instead, you will see him in an age-appropriate and fresh role.” - Srikanth Odela

This project marks an exciting new chapter for both Srikanth Odela and Chiranjeevi, as it aims to present the Megastar in a modern light.

item.title: Latest : Pawan Kalyan comments on Allu Arjun - 123telugu
item.description:
Pawan Kalyan Comments on Allu Arjun Incident

Published on Dec 30, 2024 | Source: 123telugu

Pushpa 2's premiere tragedy and Allu Arjun's arrest sparked debates. Pawan Kalyan, for the first time, shares his perspective.

  1. Pawan Kalyan appreciates Telangana CM Revanth Reddy's support to the film industry.
  2. He expresses sadness over Revathi's death and criticizes the lack of empathy shown.
  3. Kalyan believes Allu Arjun shouldn't be solely blamed for the incident.

"A minor issue was unnecessarily turned into a major controversy... The law is equal for everyone." - Pawan Kalyan

Pawan Kalyan suggests better communication and empathy to handle such situations.

item.title: Rana Daggubati unveils ‘Bapu’ first look poster - 123telugu
item.description:
Rana Daggubati unveils ‘Bapu’ first look poster

Published on: Dec 30, 2024 1:15 pm IST

Rana Daggubati has released the first look for the upcoming film 'Bapu', a dark comedy-drama that promises to blend humor with emotional depth.

  • Produced by Comrade Film Factory, 'Bapu' is directed by Daya.
  • The film features Brahmaji and a stellar ensemble cast including Amani, Balagam Sudhakar Reddy, and Dhanya Balakrishna.
  • The plot centers on a farming family facing a profound emotional dilemma.
  • The film combines a dark premise with dark comedy.
“It tackles grave situations with humor to present an unconventional yet poignant narrative.”

The film aims to offer a unique experience by intertwining family dynamics with humor and emotion.

item.title: Squid Game Season 2 ENDING Explained: Gi-Hun's Failed Rebellion, Front Man's Real Plan And More Cliffhanger Qu - Times Now
item.description:
Squid Game Season 2 ENDING Explained: Gi-Hun's Failed Rebellion, Front Man's Real Plan And More Cliffhanger Questions

Publication Date: December 26, 2023

Source: The News Network

Squid Game Season 2 has unleashed mayhem on Netflix with its gripping storyline. This season follows Seong Gi-hun, who returns to the deadly game amidst chaos and strategic conflicts.

  • Gi-hun plans a rebellion against the game but ends up without backup.
  • The stakes rise as players face dire consequences, with numerous casualties.
  • Hwang In-ho reveals his true identity as the Front Man and backstabs Gi-hun.
  • The season ends with unresolved cliffhangers, leaving viewers eager for the next installment.
“While we need to wait to get answers in its final season in 2025, here are some burning questions that have left us wondering.”

The unresolved nature of the ending and the revelations about the characters heighten the anticipation for future episodes.

item.title: Naga Chaitanya in talks for yet another supernatural thriller? - 123telugu
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya in Talks for Another Supernatural Thriller

Published on Dec 30, 2024

Actor Naga Chaitanya is considering another supernatural thriller after the success of Amazon Prime's 'Dhootha'. This project would be under the direction of Karthik Varma Dandu and produced by Arka Media Works, known for 'Baahubali'. Chaitanya is yet to sign the project, which is expected to start filming in the second half of 2025.

  1. Chaitanya's interest in supernatural thrillers
  2. Upcoming project under Karthik Varma Dandu
  3. Potential production by Arka Media Works
  4. Expected filming timeline

Chaitanya will also star in 'Thandel', an emotional seaside love story alongside Sai Pallavi, set to release worldwide on February 7.

item.title: Laapataa Ladies actor Nitanshi Goel reveals Kriti Sanon's compliment for her: I see younger version of myself in you - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kriti Sanon Compliments Laapataa Ladies Actor Nitanshi Goel

Publication Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Nitanshi Goel, the star of Laapataa Ladies, expressed her joy over a heartfelt compliment from Kriti Sanon, who noted a resemblance to her younger self.

  • Nitanshi Goel received a compliment from Kriti Sanon, expressing that she sees her younger self in Goel.
  • The scene where Nitanshi's character, Phool, breaks down was improvised and moved the film's team to tears.
  • Laapataa Ladies is a feminist drama set in early 2000s rural India, focusing on swapped brides.
  • The film was India's official entry for the Oscars but did not make it to the final shortlist.
Kriti Sanon: "I see little Kriti in you. I wish to see you kill it on screen." - Nitanshi Goel reminiscing about the compliment she received.

The encouraging words from Kriti Sanon stand as a significant milestone for Nitanshi Goel and highlight the supportive nature of female relationships in the film industry.

item.title: Sonakshi Sinha, Zaheer Iqbal get roaring alarm on their Australia holiday! Watch as a lion appears at their window - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sonakshi Sinha, Zaheer Iqbal get roaring alarm on their Australia holiday!

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Newlyweds Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal are currently enjoying their vacation in Australia, staying in a glass house surrounded by lions in Canberra.

  • On Monday morning, the couple shared a video of a roaring lion outside their glass wall, captioned “Today's alarm clock!!!!”
  • They previously shared a video of a lion and lioness playing near their accommodation.
  • They have engaged in several activities including scuba diving, sunbathing, and bungee jumping during their trip.
  • Zaheer shared a funny video of a road trip where he startled Sonakshi awake while she was asleep.
Zaheer jokingly stated, “Jabse isse mili hu meri neend udd gayi hai” (My sleep has gone for a toss ever since I met her).

This adventurous holiday has showcased the couple's fun-filled experiences and interactions with wildlife in Australia.

item.title: She sang it better at 91: Karan Aujla on Asha Bhosle's 'Tauba Tauba' performance - India Today
item.description:
Singer Asha Bhosle, 91, Viral 'Tauba Tauba' Performance in Dubai

Date: Dec 30, 2024
Source: India Today

At her Dubai concert, veteran singer Asha Bhosle, 91, captivated the audience by singing Karan Aujla's chartbuster "Tauba Tauba" and even recreating the hook step originally performed by actor Vicky Kaushal. A video of her performance has gone viral on social media.

Draped elegantly in a white saree, Bhosle delivered a remarkable rendition of "Tauba Tauba" from the film Bad Newz. She set aside her microphone and performed the hook step, drawing loud cheers from the crowd.

The video sparked admiration and love from colleagues in the music and film industries. Karan Aujla, the original singer of "Tauba Tauba," expressed his gratitude with a heartfelt note and shared the video, stating, "She sang it at 91 better than me."

Watch the video here: https://www.indiatoday.in/videos

  1. Asha Bhosle's performance earned praise from numerous industry colleagues.
  2. The viral video highlights the singer's agility and adaptability at 91.
  3. The event brought together different generations and cultures through music.

Notable Quote: "She sang it at 91 better than me." - Karan Aujla

Conclusion: Asha Bhosle's 'Tauba Tauba' performance at 91 serves as an inspiration, proving that age is just a number when it comes to passion and talent.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 25: Allu Arjun film flexes big in India; beats combined collections of Baby John, Marco, Max - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 25: Allu Arjun film flexes big in India; beats combined collections of Baby John, Marco, Max

Publication Date: 2024-12-25 | Source: The Indian Express

The blockbuster success of Pushpa 2: The Rule is evident from its impressive box office performance, outperforming several films released during the Christmas period.

  • In its fourth week, Pushpa 2 grossed Rs 37.25 crore in India.
  • It surpassed the combined earnings of Baby John, Marco, and Max which were released recently.
  • The film has become the highest grosser in Indian cinema for 2024.
  • Pushing the gross to Rs 1719.5 crore globally, it is expected to breach the Rs 1800 crore mark soon.
  • The film's dubbed version has also seen unprecedented success in the Hindi market.
“If this doesn’t showcase the strength and pull of this Allu Arjun-starrer, then what will?”

With no major releases imminent, Pushpa 2 is likely to maintain its strong position in theaters for the foreseeable future.

item.title: Rajesh Khanna wanted to marry THIS gorgeous actress before Dimple Kapadia, but rumours of her affair with cri - India.com
item.description:
Rajesh Khanna's Unmarried Life: A Look into His Relationship with Anju Mahendru

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, India.com

Rajesh Khanna, the iconic Bollywood actor, had a relationship with Anju Mahendru before marrying Dimple Kapadia. The couple lived together for seven years, but their relationship ended due to compatibility issues and rumors of Mahendru's affair with cricketer Gary Sobers.

  1. Rajesh Khanna wanted to marry Anju Mahendru but parted ways due to compatibility issues.
  2. Rumors of Anju Mahendru's affair with West Indies cricketer Gary Sobers caused a rift between the couple.
  3. Rajesh Khanna later married Dimple Kapadia, and they have two daughters, Twinkle and Rinke Khanna.
Anju Mahendru opened up about their relationship, saying, “I was critical because that’s how I am... He has always been sensitive to criticism, and I’ve always been very frank.”

Read the full story to learn more about Rajesh Khanna's relationship with Anju Mahendru and his life before marrying Dimple Kapadia.

item.title: Asha Bhosle doesn't miss a beat even at 91 as she sings Tauba Tauba, recreates Vicky Kaushal's hook step at Dubai show - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Asha Bhosle doesn't miss a beat even at 91 as she sings Tauba Tauba, recreates Vicky Kaushal's hook step at Dubai show

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

At 91, legendary singer Asha Bhosle continues to impress audiences with her performances. Recently, she performed the hit song Tauba Tauba during a concert in Dubai, showcasing her ability to keep up with current trends.

  • Asha Bhosle performed Tauba Tauba, a song by Karan Aujla, in Dubai.
  • She danced to the signature moves associated with the song, popularized by Vicky Kaushal.
  • Videos of her performance went viral, receiving widespread praise on social media.
  • Karan Aujla expressed his gratitude for her performance and shared his admiration on Instagram.
“Respect... WHAT AT 91... MOST ELDERLY PEOPLE I KNOW IN THEIR EARLY 60’S CAN’T EVEN WALK ON THEIR OWN AND LOOK AT ASHA TAI DOING ALL OF THAT WITH SO MUCH OF FLAMBOYANCE AND FINESSE.”

Asha Bhosle's vibrant performance at this age is a testament to her enduring talent and passion for music.

item.title: Gal Gadot reveals she was diagnosed with blood clot in brain during 4th pregnancy, underwent surgery during delivery - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Gal Gadot reveals she was diagnosed with blood clot in brain during 4th pregnancy, underwent surgery during delivery

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Gal Gadot announced that she was diagnosed with a brain blood clot during her fourth pregnancy, leading to emergency surgery. She aims to raise awareness about this rare condition.

  • Gal Gadot gave birth to her daughter Ori earlier this year.
  • She suffered from excruciating headaches before being diagnosed with Cerebral venous thrombosis (CVT).
  • Approximately 3 in 100,000 pregnant women in their 30s+ are diagnosed with CVT.
  • Gadot underwent emergency surgery shortly before delivering Ori.
  • She emphasized the importance of listening to one’s body and raising awareness about CVT.
“It’s vital to listen to our bodies and trust what it’s telling us. Awareness matters.” - Gal Gadot

This experience has led Gadot to reflect on the fragility of life and the importance of health awareness.

item.title: 2024: 3 Films Won Hearts with a Genuine Attempt - M9
item.description:
2024: 3 Films Won Hearts with a Genuine Attempt

Publication Date: 2024
Source: M9 News

M9 News is doing a year-end recap for 2024, and we found only three movies that gained recognition through their genuine efforts.

  • The three films are 35 Chinna Katha Kaadu, Committee Kurrollu, and Pekamedalu.
  • These films did not feature any star-driven hype or promotional gimmicks.
  • Positive word-of-mouth contributed to their success on OTT platforms.
  • Nivetha Thomas’ performance in 35 Chinna Katha Kaadu was particularly praised.
  • Committee Kurrollu captured 90s nostalgia effectively.
  • Pekamedalu resonated with audiences for its relatable story.
“We wish them the best with their future projects, if they continue to make genuine films.”

These films were recognized for their honest efforts, showcasing the power of genuine storytelling in cinema.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut Lauds Himachal Women, Calls Them ‘Equal Or Better Looking’ Than Preity Zinta, Yami Gautam - News18
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut Praises Himachal Women’s Beauty and Hard Work

Date: December 30, 2024 | Source: News18

Actress and politician Kangana Ranaut recently lauded women from her home state of Himachal Pradesh, praising their hard work and beauty on social media. She mentioned fellow actresses including Preity Zinta and Yami Gautam in her message, highlighting the strength and dedication of Himachali women.

  • Kangana appreciates the hardworking women of Himachal Pradesh.
  • She acknowledges fellow actresses like Preity Zinta and Yami Gautam.
  • Shared sentiments about women working in fields without social media recognition.
  • Celebrated Christmas with traditional food and shared personal moments on social media.
  • Discussed her upcoming movie, 'Emergency', and its new release date.
"When I go to Himachal and see our women equally or better looking than us work tirelessly in the fields... I feel they can definitely do with some hype."

This heartfelt acknowledgment of women’s contributions serves as a reminder of their unsung efforts and beauty.

item.title: 'Baby John' box office collection day 5: Varun Dhawan’s massy action drama struggles to cross ₹30 crore, - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John box office collection day 5: Varun Dhawan’s massy action drama struggles to cross ₹30 crore, while Allu Arjun's ‘Pushpa 2’ continues to impress

Date: October 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

Introduction

The latest update on the box office performance reveals that Varun Dhawan’s film 'Baby John' is having difficulty crossing ₹30 crore in its first five days, while 'Pushpa 2' continues to perform well.

Key Points

  • 'Baby John' has grossed approximately ₹30 crore in its initial five days.
  • Varun Dhawan’s film faces tough competition from 'Pushpa 2'.
  • Allu Arjun’s 'Pushpa 2' continues to gain traction and impress audiences.
  • Industry experts are analyzing the reasons behind the underperformance of 'Baby John'.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

“The film's performance is underwhelming given the hype prior to its release.”

Conclusion

While 'Baby John' struggled at the box office, the ongoing success of 'Pushpa 2' illustrates the competitive nature of the film industry.

item.title: Kalki 2898 AD, Stree 2, Moana, to Inside Out 2: Highest grossing Bollywood and Hollywood films of 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Top Grossing Films of 2024: Bollywood and Hollywood Highlights

Date: December 29, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The year 2024 proved to be an extraordinary year for both Bollywood and Hollywood, showcasing a series of blockbusters that captivated audiences with compelling storytelling and star-studded casts.

  • Kalki 2898 AD: A sci-fi epic grossing approximately ₹1100 crore worldwide, starring Prabhas, Amitabh Bachchan, and Deepika Padukone.
  • Stree 2: Directed by Amar Kaushik, this sequel grossed around ₹850 crore at the box office.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule: Surpassing ₹1700 crore, it's the highest-grossing Bollywood film of the year.
  • Inside Out 2: A major success for Hollywood, it earned nearly USD 1.7 billion worldwide.
  • Deadpool & Wolverine: Another Marvel hit, grossing over USD 1.138 billion.
“The number you see is a reflection of the people's love.” - Allu Arjun

As the year draws to a close, both industries are poised for exciting future releases including highly anticipated films from top actors.

item.title: Scorpio Horoscope Today: December 30, 2024 - VOGUE India
item.description:

Date: December 30, 2024

Source: Vogue

Today, Scorpios are advised to focus on balance between work and rest. Instead of pushing physically, channel mental strength to overcome challenges.

  • Avoid committing to short-term projects without long-term consideration.
  • Health is highlighted as a vital aspect of wealth.
“Health is wealth.”

In conclusion, the horoscope encourages Scorpios to align their efforts with their long-term goals to avoid burnout.

"Reset your default to light-mode."

This horoscope encourages Sagittarians to focus on personal growth and resilience as we approach the new year.

item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 30, 2024
